name: v0.2.8
body:
## Using Bzlmod

Add the following to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_img", version = "0.2.8")
```

For further instructions, see the [README](https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_img#readme).

## Using WORKSPACE

Add the following to your `WORKSPACE.bazel` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "rules_img",
    sha256 = "9cc7b0bafb55f4f6fb1e19b038c18b3ec05dfb5b143e72b7078b92263acf72fc",
    urls = ["https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_img/releases/download/v0.2.8/rules_img-v0.2.8.tar.gz"],
)

# Load dependencies
load("@rules_img//img:dependencies.bzl", "rules_img_dependencies")
rules_img_dependencies()

# Register prebuilt toolchains
load("@rules_img//img:repositories.bzl", "img_register_prebuilt_toolchains", "pull_tool_register_prebuilt_repositories")
img_register_prebuilt_toolchains()
register_toolchains("@img_toolchain//:all")

# Register prebuilt pull_tool repositories (for pull functionality)
pull_tool_register_prebuilt_repositories()

# Example: Pull a base image
load("@rules_img//img:pull.bzl", "pull")
pull(
    name = "alpine",
    digest = "sha256:4bcff63911fcb4448bd4fdacec207030997caf25e9bea4045fa6c8c44de311d1",
    registry = "index.docker.io",
    repository = "library/alpine",
    tag = "3.22",
)
```

For more examples, see the [README](https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_img#readme).


<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at v0.2.8 -->

## What's Changed
* Support multiple tags in image_load rule by @malt3 in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_img/pull/194
* Document registry authentication by @malt3 in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_img/pull/196
* containerd image loading platform filtering by @malt3 in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_img/pull/197
* upgrade bazel nightly to 9.0.0-pre.20251022.1 by @malt3 in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_img/pull/210
* Add created attribute to image_manifest rule by @malt3 in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_img/pull/212
* Store Bazel lockfile in Git by @malt3 in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_img/pull/211
* Platform transition on single-platform image_manifest by @malt3 in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_img/pull/208
* feat: add tag_file attribute to image_push and image_load by @malt3 in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_img/pull/213
* Allow for guessing mediaType in more places by @malt3 in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_img/pull/207


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_img/compare/v0.2.7...v0.2.8

name: v0.2.7
body:
## Using Bzlmod

Add the following to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_img", version = "0.2.7")
```

For further instructions, see the [README](https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_img#readme).

## Using WORKSPACE

Add the following to your `WORKSPACE.bazel` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "rules_img",
    sha256 = "0a3514d03e29820acdc027d05317ee7f28f996445c32765116c4261c21a09995",
    urls = ["https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_img/releases/download/v0.2.7/rules_img-v0.2.7.tar.gz"],
)

# Load dependencies
load("@rules_img//img:dependencies.bzl", "rules_img_dependencies")
rules_img_dependencies()

# Register prebuilt toolchains
load("@rules_img//img:repositories.bzl", "img_register_prebuilt_toolchains", "pull_tool_register_prebuilt_repositories")
img_register_prebuilt_toolchains()
register_toolchains("@img_toolchain//:all")

# Register prebuilt pull_tool repositories (for pull functionality)
pull_tool_register_prebuilt_repositories()

# Example: Pull a base image
load("@rules_img//img:pull.bzl", "pull")
pull(
    name = "alpine",
    digest = "sha256:4bcff63911fcb4448bd4fdacec207030997caf25e9bea4045fa6c8c44de311d1",
    registry = "index.docker.io",
    repository = "library/alpine",
    tag = "3.22",
)
```

For more examples, see the [README](https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_img#readme).


<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at v0.2.7 -->

## What's Changed
* Add distroless demo by @malt3 in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_img/pull/148
* enable nogo by @malt3 in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_img/pull/162
* oci_tarball: use forward slash for tar contents by @malt3 in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_img/pull/178
* Correctly handle compression in layer_from_tar by @malt3 in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_img/pull/185
* pull: detect root blob mediaType if missing by @malt3 in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_img/pull/189
* deploy rules: Use extra execution group to obtain "bazel run" tool  by @malt3 in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_img/pull/187

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_img/compare/v0.2.6...v0.2.7

name: v0.2.6
body:
## Using Bzlmod

Add the following to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_img", version = "0.2.6")
```

For further instructions, see the [README](https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_img#readme).

## Using WORKSPACE

Add the following to your `WORKSPACE.bazel` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "rules_img",
    sha256 = "2437a800c7c3369c0091c45aa0de83805ccbde53956658cbf44e9b74dc67e498",
    urls = ["https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_img/releases/download/v0.2.6/rules_img-v0.2.6.tar.gz"],
)

# Load dependencies
load("@rules_img//img:dependencies.bzl", "rules_img_dependencies")
rules_img_dependencies()

# Register prebuilt toolchains
load("@rules_img//img:repositories.bzl", "img_register_prebuilt_toolchains", "pull_tool_register_prebuilt_repositories")
img_register_prebuilt_toolchains()
register_toolchains("@img_toolchain//:all")

# Register prebuilt pull_tool repositories (for pull functionality)
pull_tool_register_prebuilt_repositories()

# Example: Pull a base image
load("@rules_img//img:pull.bzl", "pull")
pull(
    name = "alpine",
    digest = "sha256:4bcff63911fcb4448bd4fdacec207030997caf25e9bea4045fa6c8c44de311d1",
    registry = "index.docker.io",
    repository = "library/alpine",
    tag = "3.22",
)
```

For more examples, see the [README](https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_img#readme).


<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at v0.2.6 -->

## What's Changed
### What's Changed
* Warn about digest mismatch when using docker load by @malt3 in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_img/pull/94
* feat: run Linux CI jobs on Aspect Workflows by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_img/pull/101
* further fix containerd loading by @TroyKomodo in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_img/pull/106
* GitHub Actions: avoid running on Renovate PRs by default by @malt3 in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_img/pull/125
* use prebuilt protoc toolchain by @malt3 in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_img/pull/127
* release note generator: add categories by @malt3 in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_img/pull/126
* load: move warning to stderr by @TroyKomodo in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_img/pull/129
* load: remove bad log by @TroyKomodo in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_img/pull/131
* Vendor generated Go code by @malt3 in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_img/pull/132
* Separate out "pull_tool" binary by @malt3 in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_img/pull/137
* load: minor improvements by @TroyKomodo in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_img/pull/136
* Support Bazel 9 by @malt3 in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_img/pull/143
* Add support for `--repo_contents_cache` by @malt3 in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_img/pull/144


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_img/compare/v0.2.5...v0.2.6

name: v0.2.5
body:
## Using Bzlmod

Add the following to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_img", version = "0.2.5")
```

For further instructions, see the [README](https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_img#readme).

## Using WORKSPACE

Add the following to your `WORKSPACE.bazel` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "rules_img",
    sha256 = "0e7a69e8a0f453b28e384f4483b7e47ab91ac6ae9a312924e6467ea50daefa97",
    urls = ["https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_img/releases/download/v0.2.5/rules_img-v0.2.5.tar.gz"],
)

# Load dependencies
load("@rules_img//img:dependencies.bzl", "rules_img_dependencies")
rules_img_dependencies()

# Register prebuilt toolchains
load("@rules_img//img:repositories.bzl", "img_register_prebuilt_toolchains")
img_register_prebuilt_toolchains()
register_toolchains("@img_toolchain//:all")

# Example: Pull a base image
load("@rules_img//img:pull.bzl", "pull")
pull(
    name = "alpine",
    digest = "sha256:4bcff63911fcb4448bd4fdacec207030997caf25e9bea4045fa6c8c44de311d1",
    registry = "index.docker.io",
    repository = "library/alpine",
    tag = "3.22",
)
```

For more examples, see the [README](https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_img#readme).


## What's Changed
* tar layer creation: calculate digests of inputs in advance by @malt3 in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_img/pull/73
* add rootless common containerd paths by @TroyKomodo in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_img/pull/77
* fix containerd loader logic by @TroyKomodo in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_img/pull/79
* chore: Configure Renovate by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_img/pull/75
* push/load/multi_deploy: correctly choose img tool for host by @malt3 in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_img/pull/86
* mass-rename after migration: s/tweag/bazel-contrib/g by @malt3 in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_img/pull/83
* chore(deps): update bazel-contrib/publish-to-bcr action to v0.2.3 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_img/pull/88
* fix(deps): update google.golang.org/genproto/googleapis/api digest to 57b25ae by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_img/pull/84
* chore(deps): update dependency rules_python to v1.6.3 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_img/pull/91
* chore(deps): update actions/checkout digest to 08eba0b by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_img/pull/80
* README: add Tweag logo by @malt3 in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_img/pull/89

## New Contributors
* @TroyKomodo made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_img/pull/77
* @renovate[bot] made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_img/pull/75

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_img/compare/v0.2.4...v0.2.5

name: v0.2.4
body:
## Using Bzlmod

Add the following to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_img", version = "0.2.4")
```

For further instructions, see the [README](https://github.com/tweag/rules_img#readme).

## Using WORKSPACE

Add the following to your `WORKSPACE.bazel` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "rules_img",
    sha256 = "72e2aef5d26c5708beb0a9c01d24f3b558b52f757850a14bc5b8cd671c00ffb5",
    urls = ["https://github.com/tweag/rules_img/releases/download/v0.2.4/rules_img-v0.2.4.tar.gz"],
)

# Load dependencies
load("@rules_img//img:dependencies.bzl", "rules_img_dependencies")
rules_img_dependencies()

# Register prebuilt toolchains
load("@rules_img//img:repositories.bzl", "img_register_prebuilt_toolchains")
img_register_prebuilt_toolchains()
register_toolchains("@img_toolchain//:all")

# Example: Pull a base image
load("@rules_img//img:pull.bzl", "pull")
pull(
    name = "alpine",
    digest = "sha256:4bcff63911fcb4448bd4fdacec207030997caf25e9bea4045fa6c8c44de311d1",
    registry = "index.docker.io",
    repository = "library/alpine",
    tag = "3.22",
)
```

For more examples, see the [README](https://github.com/tweag/rules_img#readme).


## What's Changed
* Ability to write oci and docker tarballs by @malt3 in https://github.com/tweag/rules_img/pull/67
* fix: use expanded tag template in image_load tarball output by @malt3 in https://github.com/tweag/rules_img/pull/68
* stamping in config, manifest and index by @malt3 in https://github.com/tweag/rules_img/pull/69
* parallel gzip support by @malt3 in https://github.com/tweag/rules_img/pull/70
* integration tests: remove credential helper by @malt3 in https://github.com/tweag/rules_img/pull/71
* pull: handle missing "registry" attr correctly by @malt3 in https://github.com/tweag/rules_img/pull/72


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/tweag/rules_img/compare/v0.2.3...v0.2.4

name: v0.2.3
body:
## Using Bzlmod

Add the following to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_img", version = "0.2.3")
```

For further instructions, see the [README](https://github.com/tweag/rules_img#readme).

## Using WORKSPACE

Add the following to your `WORKSPACE.bazel` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "rules_img",
    sha256 = "2102707391184af3c13e68ed0498a7f2ac9e7e23d7f975a3287b0838610316b3",
    urls = ["https://github.com/tweag/rules_img/releases/download/v0.2.3/rules_img-v0.2.3.tar.gz"],
)

# Load dependencies
load("@rules_img//img:dependencies.bzl", "rules_img_dependencies")
rules_img_dependencies()

# Register prebuilt toolchains
load("@rules_img//img:repositories.bzl", "img_register_prebuilt_toolchains")
img_register_prebuilt_toolchains()
register_toolchains("@img_toolchain//:all")

# Example: Pull a base image
load("@rules_img//img:pull.bzl", "pull")
pull(
    name = "alpine",
    digest = "sha256:4bcff63911fcb4448bd4fdacec207030997caf25e9bea4045fa6c8c44de311d1",
    registry = "index.docker.io",
    repository = "library/alpine",
    tag = "3.22",
)
```

For more examples, see the [README](https://github.com/tweag/rules_img#readme).


## What's Changed
* Check for nil "Created" timestamp in image config when merging by @malt3 in https://github.com/tweag/rules_img/pull/59
* loader: set default load platform to Linux by @malt3 in https://github.com/tweag/rules_img/pull/56
* cas read: don't set explicit read limit by @malt3 in https://github.com/tweag/rules_img/pull/61
* img push: return with non-zero exit code when pushing fails by @malt3 in https://github.com/tweag/rules_img/pull/60
* cas: wrap errors to indicate that they originate from a Bazel remote cache by @malt3 in https://github.com/tweag/rules_img/pull/62
* tarcas: remove size from hardlinks by @malt3 in https://github.com/tweag/rules_img/pull/63


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/tweag/rules_img/compare/v0.2.2...v0.2.3

name: v0.2.2
body:
## Using Bzlmod

Add the following to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_img", version = "0.2.2")
```

For further instructions, see the [README](https://github.com/tweag/rules_img#readme).

## Using WORKSPACE

Add the following to your `WORKSPACE.bazel` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "rules_img",
    sha256 = "bafd81f0af49ef32d560653006646119a7210522aa1f5a7b892039b919ccddc9",
    urls = ["https://github.com/tweag/rules_img/releases/download/v0.2.2/rules_img-v0.2.2.tar.gz"],
)

# Load dependencies
load("@rules_img//img:dependencies.bzl", "rules_img_dependencies")
rules_img_dependencies()

# Register prebuilt toolchains
load("@rules_img//img:repositories.bzl", "img_register_prebuilt_toolchains")
img_register_prebuilt_toolchains()
register_toolchains("@img_toolchain//:all")

# Example: Pull a base image
load("@rules_img//img:pull.bzl", "pull")
pull(
    name = "alpine",
    digest = "sha256:4bcff63911fcb4448bd4fdacec207030997caf25e9bea4045fa6c8c44de311d1",
    registry = "index.docker.io",
    repository = "library/alpine",
    tag = "3.22",
)
```

For more examples, see the [README](https://github.com/tweag/rules_img#readme).


## What's Changed
* move shared stamping code into a separate bzl file by @malt3 in https://github.com/tweag/rules_img/pull/47
* Only stamp if template strings are present by @malt3 in https://github.com/tweag/rules_img/pull/48
* enable stamping by default by @alexeagle in https://github.com/tweag/rules_img/pull/44
* Handle nil status from BatchReadBlobs by @mortenmj in https://github.com/tweag/rules_img/pull/52
* Interpolate workspace in credential helper path by @psalaberria002 in https://github.com/tweag/rules_img/pull/51
* Refactor load and push to enable "multi deploy" by @malt3 in https://github.com/tweag/rules_img/pull/53
* Implement "multi_deploy" rule by @malt3 in https://github.com/tweag/rules_img/pull/54
* mark pull#tag as optional by @malt3 in https://github.com/tweag/rules_img/pull/55

## New Contributors
* @alexeagle made their first contribution in https://github.com/tweag/rules_img/pull/44
* @psalaberria002 made their first contribution in https://github.com/tweag/rules_img/pull/51

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/tweag/rules_img/compare/v0.2.1...v0.2.2

Add the following to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_img", version = "0.2.1")
```

For further instructions, see the [README](https://github.com/tweag/rules_img#readme).

## Using WORKSPACE

Add the following to your `WORKSPACE.bazel` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "rules_img",
    sha256 = "817c5df25923be0c7e340e6f16d9bbc6c62f03ac68497b0d681e7a6582e7910b",
    urls = ["https://github.com/tweag/rules_img/releases/download/v0.2.1/rules_img-v0.2.1.tar.gz"],

# Load dependencies
load("@rules_img//img:dependencies.bzl", "rules_img_dependencies")
rules_img_dependencies()

# Register prebuilt toolchains
load("@rules_img//img:repositories.bzl", "img_register_prebuilt_toolchains")

register_toolchains("@img_toolchain//:all")

# Example: Pull a base image

    name = "alpine",

    tag = "3.22",

```

For more examples, see the [README](https://github.com/tweag/rules_img#readme).


## What's Changed
* add JS example by @malt3 in https://github.com/tweag/rules_img/pull/36
* Check for empty tar by @malt3 in https://github.com/tweag/rules_img/pull/37
* WORKSPACE support by @malt3 in https://github.com/tweag/rules_img/pull/39
* Add CLI flags to push command for additional tags and registry override by @malt3 in https://github.com/tweag/rules_img/pull/40
* improve credential helper setting docs in main README by @malt3 in https://github.com/tweag/rules_img/pull/41
* Add ci bazelrc options by @malt3 in https://github.com/tweag/rules_img/pull/42


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/tweag/rules_img/compare/v0.2.0...v0.2.1

name: v0.2.0
body:
## What's Changed
* image_manifest: fully embrace platforms by @malt3 in https://github.com/tweag/rules_img/pull/23
* image_manifest: automatically convert tar layers by @malt3 in https://github.com/tweag/rules_img/pull/34
* Move Go code into separate Bazel module by @malt3 in https://github.com/tweag/rules_img/pull/30
* Use img tool in pull repo rule by @malt3 in https://github.com/tweag/rules_img/pull/31
* add Python example by @malt3 in https://github.com/tweag/rules_img/pull/35
* add a clear failure message if nested index is found by @malt3 in https://github.com/tweag/rules_img/pull/25
* Fix template expansion in image_load rule by @malt3 in https://github.com/tweag/rules_img/pull/27
* Try Google credentials as a fallback after trying DefaultKeychain by @mortenmj in https://github.com/tweag/rules_img/pull/28
* add zig toolchain for better remote execution support by @malt3 in https://github.com/tweag/rules_img/pull/29
* add a test to show that the rules can be extended by @malt3 in https://github.com/tweag/rules_img/pull/32

## New Contributors
* @mortenmj made their first contribution in https://github.com/tweag/rules_img/pull/28

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/tweag/rules_img/compare/v0.1.5...v0.2.0

name: v0.2.0-rc1
body:
## What's Changed
* add a clear failure message if nested index is found by @malt3 in https://github.com/tweag/rules_img/pull/25
* Fix template expansion in image_load rule by @malt3 in https://github.com/tweag/rules_img/pull/27
* Try Google credentials as a fallback after trying DefaultKeychain by @mortenmj in https://github.com/tweag/rules_img/pull/28
* image_manifest: fully embrace platforms by @malt3 in https://github.com/tweag/rules_img/pull/23
* add zig toolchain for better remote execution support by @malt3 in https://github.com/tweag/rules_img/pull/29
* Move Go code into separate Bazel module by @malt3 in https://github.com/tweag/rules_img/pull/30
* Use img tool in pull repo rule by @malt3 in https://github.com/tweag/rules_img/pull/31
* add a test to show that the rules can be extended by @malt3 in https://github.com/tweag/rules_img/pull/32
* Prepare 0.2.0-rc0 by @malt3 in https://github.com/tweag/rules_img/pull/33

## New Contributors
* @mortenmj made their first contribution in https://github.com/tweag/rules_img/pull/28

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/tweag/rules_img/compare/v0.1.5...v0.2.0-rc1

name: v0.2.0-rc0
body:
## What's Changed
* add a clear failure message if nested index is found by @malt3 in https://github.com/tweag/rules_img/pull/25
* Fix template expansion in image_load rule by @malt3 in https://github.com/tweag/rules_img/pull/27
* Try Google credentials as a fallback after trying DefaultKeychain by @mortenmj in https://github.com/tweag/rules_img/pull/28
* image_manifest: fully embrace platforms by @malt3 in https://github.com/tweag/rules_img/pull/23
* add zig toolchain for better remote execution support by @malt3 in https://github.com/tweag/rules_img/pull/29
* Move Go code into separate Bazel module by @malt3 in https://github.com/tweag/rules_img/pull/30
* Use img tool in pull repo rule by @malt3 in https://github.com/tweag/rules_img/pull/31
* add a test to show that the rules can be extended by @malt3 in https://github.com/tweag/rules_img/pull/32
* Prepare 0.2.0-rc0 by @malt3 in https://github.com/tweag/rules_img/pull/33

## New Contributors
* @mortenmj made their first contribution in https://github.com/tweag/rules_img/pull/28

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/tweag/rules_img/compare/v0.1.5...v0.2.0-rc0

name: v0.1.5
body:
## What's Changed
* image_load: add support for loading images into a local daemon by @malt3 in https://github.com/tweag/rules_img/pull/19
* image_push: add config settings for remote cache endpoint and credential helper path by @malt3 in https://github.com/tweag/rules_img/pull/21
* improve docs by @malt3 in https://github.com/tweag/rules_img/pull/22
* fix formatting bug during push by @malt3 in https://github.com/tweag/rules_img/pull/20



**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/tweag/rules_img/compare/v0.1.4...v0.1.5

name: v0.1.4
body:
## What's Changed
* Pull: add different strategies for handling layers in external base images by @malt3 in https://github.com/tweag/rules_img/pull/11
* Generate OCI image layout on demand by @malt3 in https://github.com/tweag/rules_img/pull/13
* image rules: add digest output group by @malt3 in https://github.com/tweag/rules_img/pull/14
* image_layer: add support for file metadata by @malt3 in https://github.com/tweag/rules_img/pull/16
* testing framework for img toolchain by @malt3 in https://github.com/tweag/rules_img/pull/15
* C++ e2e test: add zig toolchain by @malt3 in https://github.com/tweag/rules_img/pull/12


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/tweag/rules_img/compare/v0.1.3...v0.1.4

name: v0.1.2
body:
## What's Changed
* README.md: Mimizes -> Minimizes by @dws in https://github.com/tweag/rules_img/pull/9
* Fix dangling load statements in release tar by @malt3 in https://github.com/tweag/rules_img/pull/10

## New Contributors
* @dws made their first contribution in https://github.com/tweag/rules_img/pull/9

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/tweag/rules_img/compare/v0.1.1...v0.1.2

name: v0.0.2
body:
## What's Changed
* add logo by @malt3 in https://github.com/tweag/rules_img/pull/5

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/tweag/rules_img/compare/v0.0.1...v0.0.2

name: v0.0.1
body:
## What's Changed
* Fix issues related to CI by @malt3 in https://github.com/tweag/rules_img/pull/2
* add more Go examples by @malt3 in https://github.com/tweag/rules_img/pull/3
* add C++ example by @malt3 in https://github.com/tweag/rules_img/pull/4

## New Contributors
* @malt3 made their first contribution in https://github.com/tweag/rules_img/pull/2

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/tweag/rules_img/commits/v0.0.1
